pr_title: DB-9171 Allow defining unique and PK constraint on same column(s)

timeline.message:
DB-9171 Allow defining unique constraint and PK constraint on same column.

- Some tools (e.g. SQLAlchemy) is reported to generate a DDL statement
  against SpliceMachine containing PK and UQ constraints on the same
  set of columns.
- The fix allow this syntax, but under the hood it ignores the UQ
  constraint since it is redundant.
- If a user attempts to add a redundant UQ constraint via ALTER table
  then we still throw an exception.
- Add tests and address SpotBug reported issues on affected files.

timeline.bodyText: Please use lower case method names
timeline.author: dgomezferro
